scripts.db:local:reset: docker compose down -v && docker compose up -d
scripts.db:local:setup: docker compose up -d --wait && cd server && npx dotenv -e .env.local -- npx prisma db push && npx dotenv -e .env.local -- npm run db:seed:local
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server && npm run db:deploy
scripts.db:migrate: cd server && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:deploy: cd server && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:seed: cd server && npx prisma db seed
scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
